comment: The scalar product of a subcomplex module matches the scalar product of the derived ` ZZ ` -module, which implies, together with ~ zlmbas and ~ zlmplusg , that any module over ` ZZ ` is structure-equivalent to the canonical ` ZZ ` -module ` ZMod `` G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Oct-2015.)
